author: karl.tech
content:
Sorry I missed this message!!! Address space extension is one of my favorite things & I come loaded with some strong opinions weakly held! ðŸ˜„ These are some super interesting discussions but I haven't read everything so forgive me if I bring up old topics

Update: After having read a bunch of these documents I have abandoned all of my strongly held opinions in favor of a strong sense of uncertainty but also security that we are exploring really promising solutions
